患.definition: to suffer (from illness); to contract (a disease); misfortune; trouble; danger; worry

患上.definition: to come down with; to be afflicted with (an illness)

患兒.definition: child victim of disaster or disease; afflicted child

患得患失.definition: to worry about personal gains and losses

患有.definition: to contract (an illness); to be afflicted with; to suffer from

患病者.definition: person suffering (from a disease or poisoning); a patient

患難之交.definition: a friend in times of tribulations (idiom); a friend in need is a friend indeed

患難見真情.definition: true sentiments are seen in hard times (idiom); you see who your true friends are when you go through tough times together; you see who your true friends are when you are in difficulties
